item.description: Introduction to the book “Think and Grow Rich,” by Napoleon Hill* What do Henry Ford, Bill Gates and Michael Jordan all have in common? They designed their lives using the principles in Napoleon Hill’s Classic, Think and Grow Rich. Think and Grow Abundant, could well be a revised title because the principles discussed apply to all areas of our lives not just financial. They are very much in line with what is talked about in, The Secret. Although we will be studying a book this group will be more that just a book club.  Here we use the principles that Napoleon Hill discovered from 500 of the most successful people in this country who mainly recognized that two minds are ultimately greater than one.  Members will have a time to share their successes and also ask for the benefit of brainstorming for support.
item.name: Think and Grow Rich MasterMind Study Group
